message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be interested in. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $140, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $145. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. I can do $135, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $140. Can you meet me in the middle at $137.50?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit below my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
I'm trying to find a mutually beneficial price, Bob. I can do $138, but I'm starting to think we're getting close to the minimum I'm willing to sell for. Can you meet me at $135?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned about the price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $130 and $128, which is $129. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can do $132, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
